short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Live cricket scores in a convenient browser bar

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stay updated with live cricket scores directly on your browser! The Cricket Score Bar is a sleek, non-intrusive extension that sits at the bottom of every Chrome tab, keeping you informed about ball-by-ball updates from ongoing matches. Whether you're working, browsing, or just relaxing online, you can now follow the excitement of live cricket without switching tabs or apps.

Key Features:
- Real-time ball-by-ball updates.
- Clean, minimalist design for a seamless browsing experience.
- Works across all open Chrome tabs.
- Customizable settings to follow your favorite teams and leagues.

Never miss a moment of cricket action. Install the Cricket Score Bar today and bring the game to your fingertips!
